label: Max QR-codes provided
description:
Up to 30 QR-codes along with URLS can be generated to track each platform where customer search from.
This can be linked to any social media, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or even Youtube.

label: Customer Tracking History
description: View number of customer visit your webpage by daily, weekly and annually.

label: Google SEO
description:
Make your page easily get be searched on Google.
Higher chance to let people view your products and services.

label: Maximum items
description: Maximum 500 items can be added and displayed to public.

label: Upload the page to Wonder Scale
description: Users are able to search the page on Wonder Scale website.
